org.bytedeco.depthai.StereoDepthConfig

  • Packages that use StereoDepthConfig 
    Package Description
    org.bytedeco.depthai  

    • Uses of StereoDepthConfig in org.bytedeco.depthai

      Methods in org.bytedeco.depthai that return StereoDepthConfig 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StereoDepthConfig DataOutputQueue.frontStereoDepthConfig() 
      StereoDepthConfig StereoDepthConfig.getPointer(long i) 
      StereoDepthConfig DataOutputQueue.getStereoDepthConfig() 
      StereoDepthConfig StereoDepth.initialConfig()
      Initial config to use for StereoDepth.
      StereoDepthConfig StereoDepthConfig.position(long position) 
      StereoDepthConfig StereoDepthConfig.set(RawStereoDepthConfig config)
      Set explicit configuration.
      StereoDepthConfig StereoDepthConfig.setBilateralFilterSigma(short sigma)
      A larger value of the parameter means that farther colors within the pixel neighborhood will be mixed together, resulting in larger areas of semi-equal color.
      StereoDepthConfig StereoDepthConfig.setConfidenceThreshold(int confThr)
      Confidence threshold for disparity calculation
      StereoDepthConfig StereoDepthConfig.setDepthAlign(RawStereoDepthConfig.AlgorithmControl.DepthAlign align) 
      StereoDepthConfig StereoDepthConfig.setDepthUnit(RawStereoDepthConfig.AlgorithmControl.DepthUnit depthUnit)
      Set depth unit of depth map.
      StereoDepthConfig StereoDepthConfig.setDisparityShift(int disparityShift)
      Shift input frame by a number of pixels to increase minimum depth.
      StereoDepthConfig StereoDepthConfig.setExtendedDisparity(boolean enable)
      Disparity range increased from 95 to 190, combined from full resolution and downscaled images.
      StereoDepthConfig StereoDepthConfig.setLeftRightCheck(boolean enable)
      Computes and combines disparities in both L-R and R-L directions, and combine them.
      StereoDepthConfig StereoDepthConfig.setLeftRightCheckThreshold(int threshold) 
      StereoDepthConfig StereoDepthConfig.setMedianFilter(depthai.MedianFilter median) 
      StereoDepthConfig StereoDepthConfig.setMedianFilter(int median) 
      StereoDepthConfig StereoDepthConfig.setSubpixel(boolean enable)
      Computes disparity with sub-pixel interpolation (3 fractional bits by default).
      StereoDepthConfig StereoDepthConfig.setSubpixelFractionalBits(int subpixelFractionalBits)
      Number of fractional bits for subpixel mode.
      StereoDepthConfig DataOutputQueue.tryGetStereoDepthConfig()
